mapper.insert: insert into board_tb (category_id, title, content, author, created_at) values (#{category_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, now())
mapper.update: update board_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where id = #{id} and author = #{author}
mapper.delete: delete from board_tb where id = #{id} and author = #{author}
mapper.select: select * from board_tb where title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
select * from board_tb where content like CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
select * from board_tb where author like CONCAT('%', #{author}, '%')
select * from board_tb as b inner join game_tb as g on b.category_id = g.id where category_id = #{category_id};
